name: Cuello Principiante
full_text: [[English below]] This is a beginner's neck. The pattern accompanies a series of videos to learn how to knit. With this pattern you will learn to: cast on stitches with the long strand method knit in a circular knit make elastics knit stitch purl stitch join a new ball correct errors close stitches cast off ends You can find all the videos that accompany this pattern at http://www.tejereningles.es/aprende-tejer-1 “Cuello Principiante” means Beginner Cowl in Spanish. I designed this cowl to be an ideal first knitting project. I have made a series of videos showing all the techniques but I'm afraid these are all in Spanish. If you are still interested in watching them, you can find them at www.tejereningles.es/aprende-tejer-1, but you can still follow the pattern without watching the videos.
